Class DeckOfCards

  • java.lang.Object
    • DeckOfCards

  • public class DeckOfCards
extends Object
    The DeckOfCards class simulates a 52 card deck with shuffle and deal methods

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int CARDS 
      (package private) ArrayList<Card> deck 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeckOfCards()
      The default constructor puts 52 cards into the deck in order

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card dealCard()
      The dealCard method deals the top card from the deck and returns it
      static void display(DeckOfCards d) 
      boolean isEmpty()
      The isEmpty method returns either true or false if the deck is empty
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void shuffle()
      The shuffle method shuffles the deck in a random order
